text: Antonio del Pollaiuolo (17 January 1429 â€“ 4 February 1498), also known as Antonio di Jacopo Pollaiuolo or Antonio Pollaiolo was an Italian 15th century painter. He painted The Martyrdom of St. Sebastian (1475, oil on poplar). The painting is at The National Gallery in Trafalgar Square, London. ==Related pages== * List of Italian painters Category:1429 births Category:1498 deaths Category:15th-century Italian painters
title: Antonio del Pollaiuolo
